data.subject: How Soon Is Now? (Edit)
data.lyric:
I am the son and the heir
 Of a shyness that is criminally vulgar
 I am the son and heir of nothing

data.subject: Please, Please, Please Let Me Get What I Want (2008 Remastered Ver.)
data.lyric:
Good times for a change
 see, the luck I've had
 can make a good man
 turn bad
 
 So please please p
